snippet: Zdeno Chara scored the tiebreaking goal during four-on-four play with less than two minutes left in the Boston Bruins’ win over the Washington Capitals, 4-3, Monday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins beat the Washington Capitals, 4-3, to take a lead in the first-round playoff series.
lead_paragraph: Zdeno Chara scored the tiebreaking goal during four-on-four play with less than two minutes left in the Boston Bruins’ win over the Washington Capitals, 4-3, Monday night.

headline.main: Chara’s Late Goal Lifts the Bruins
headline.print_headline: Chara’s Late Goal Lifts the Bruins
